definition: to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: It is proposed for the concealment of confidential information.
sentences.chinese: 基於相似性的搭載模型是實現信息隱蔽的一般框架。

sentences.english: Officials also said a car on board the ferry or suspected source of fire.
sentences.chinese: 官員還表示，渡輪上搭載的一輛汽車或爲疑似火源。

sentences.english: Rick goes to the shed and picks up the Bauers.
sentences.chinese: 裏克駕車來到小木屋，搭載了鮑爾一家人。

sentences.english: She was carrying 1316 passengers and a crew of 891.
sentences.chinese: 其時船上搭載着1316名乘客和891名船員。

sentences.english: I was driving a vehicle with a 106mm gun on it.
sentences.chinese: 我駕駛一輛搭載了一門106mm炮的車。

sentences.english: For aeromedical evacuations, it can carry 74 litter patients and two medical attendants.
sentences.chinese: 在撤離傷員時，可以搭載74名患者和2名醫生。

sentences.english: How many passengers can ride in your taxi?
So the seeds vigor, growing development and photosynthetic characteristics were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 由此認爲航天搭載誘變對小桐子種子活力有抑制作用。

sentences.english: The train stopped to pick up passengers then it picked up speed .
sentences.chinese: 火車停下來中途搭載旅客然後增加速度前進。

sentences.english: Some states exclude a duty of care by the driver of a motor vehicle –toward passengers whom he transports gratuitously .
sentences.chinese: 汽車司機對於他免費搭載的乘客不負照看責任。

sentences.english: What will the power to weight ratio for a tank powered by this engine?
sentences.chinese: 這款坦克搭載的發動機的功率推重比怎麼樣？

sentences.english: A myna bird looks as thought it is hitching a lift from its mate in New Delhi, India.
sentences.chinese: 印度新德里有隻鷯哥看上去像是搭載着它的小夥伴。

sentences.english: We carried an average load of seventy-five people and three pallets in a combat environment.
sentences.chinese: 在作戰環境下我們平均搭載75名人員和三個貨盤。

sentences.english: The taxi-driver stopped to pick up a fare .
sentences.chinese: 出租車司機停下車來搭載一名乘客。

sentences.english: That allows it to piggyback on the continuous improvement in semiconductor technology.
sentences.chinese: 這使得它搭載的半導體技術的不斷改進。

sentences.english: Standard functions include program operation and other high precision functions.
sentences.chinese: 搭載程控運行等多種高精度運行功能。

definition: to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to introduce into/to channel/to lead/to guide into/to import (data)
